lines.text: Draw.

[to Peter Martin, trying to provoke a fight]
Sloppy with your drink?
[Martin tries to ignore him, unsure of how to react]

[to the bartender]
Get this boy a bib!
Shut down! Shut down immediately!

[surprised]
I'm shot

[in disbelief]
What?
I... I'm shot!
[falls to the ground]

We aren't dealing with ordinary machines here. These are highly complicated pieces of equipment. Almost as complicated as living organisms. In some cases, they have been designed by other computers. We don't know exactly how they work.
There's no way to get hurt in here, just enjoy yourself.
You talk too much.
You say something, boy?
I said you talk too much.
Why don't you make me shut up?
[first lines]

Delos is the vacation of the future, today. At Delos, you get your choice of the vacation you want. There's Medieval World, Roman World and, of course, Westworld. Let's talk to some of the people who've been there.
[last lines]

[voiceover]
Why don't you make arrangements to take our hovercraft to Medieval World, Roman World and Westworld. Contact us today, or see your travel agent. Boy, have we got a vacation for you.

[taking over as the new sheriff]
Well, I'm the new law around here...

[yells from crowd]
Think you can handle things?
You wanna try me?
[he turns around to enter the sheriff's office, but struggles to get the door open]
Doesn't anything work around here?

[after Being Bitten By A Robotic Snake]
The hell, god dammit, that's not supposed to happen!

[as the guest picks up a piece of leftovers from one of the banquet hall tables]
Hold varlet!
Are you speaking to me?
None other, sire.
Look, I'm hungry and I...

[impatiently swiping the guest's helmet off the table with his broadsword, then pointing the sword menacingly at the guest]
Prepare for thy doom, thou scurrilous knave, huh?

[backing up]
Now, wait a minute. Ah, uh, can't we talk this over?
What? Have you no spine, varlet?
Well, I...
What is your name?
My name is Janet Lane and I was in Roman World.
What is the one thing that stands out in your mind about Roman World?
Oh, well, I think it would be - The Men! I just feel marvelous. I mean it's just a warm, glowing place to be.

Welcome to Delos. Please go to your color-coded tram which will take you to the World of your choice. We are sure you will enjoy your stay in Western World. While you are there, please do whatever you want. There are no rules. And you should feel free to indulge your every whim. Do not be afraid of hurting anything or of hurting yourself. Nothing can go wrong.
Well, you come to the right place. There's plenty of fun here. That's Cindy and Arlette. Arlette's from Paris. Perhaps you gentlemen are taking a liking to 'em?
Perhaps.
They're real accommodating.
They eh, they look it.
Why don't you just go on upstairs and we'll reckon accounts later.
Sounds good to me.
John, are those two girls machines?
Now, how can you say a thing like that. Come on.
Nothing can go wrong... go wrong... go wrong...
